title: 33 Preseason Questions—Preseason Revelations, Cuts That Matter, and the Story of the Season (Ep. 133)
description:
The Ringer’s Robert Mays and Kevin Clark continue answering 33 Preseason Questions leading up to opening night, including how the Titans have revealed some secret weapons (03:00), why rookie quarterbacks are on the rise in Chicago and Kansas City (09:00), and how another soon-to-be-former Jet could be joining Brandon Marshall on the Giants (12:45). Then, The Ringer’s own Danny Kelly joins the show with a gripe about Russell Wilson (21:15) and a prediction about when the spread-offense bubble could burst (31:00). Finally, Robert and Kevin discuss what will be the story of this NFL season (41:15) and whether we’ve finally arrived in the new golden era of QBs (43:15).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
